tortilla de mmm

2007-11-12

I love cooking something that is so tasty that I think about it all morning....
Breakfast today was a Spanish tortilla with mandolin-thin sliced sweet potatos, onions, and chipotle peppers to boot. I made it Saturday morning for a crowd and got thumbs up all around. Mmm.
